Normally I donât drink these light beers. But this one is surprisingly good ! 3,5% alcohol is not much , but the taste is surprisingly good. Normal colour , good head - and a (for a light beer) full body !Had an EFES light some days before - but this BizimPiva ( means âour beerâ ) is a different class .  Unfortunately azerbaijan shops donât keep this quality - most donât respect first-in-first-out stock rotation - I had it several times that I found freshest beer beside 6 months old one side by side in the shops !   Sorry for the brewmaster to see his beers treated that way.
Its nearly 12 Years ago that i had one of these. blond color, the beer itself tasted like chili, the Chili tastes like beer. Interesting and only for Chili-Lovers. Not to hot!
